name: tm38
effect: Teaches Fire Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A powerful fire attack that may burn the foe.

flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is hit with an intense flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
